headline: Tesla's Texas Plan B if Delaware won’t reinstate Elon Musk's pay. It's not about the money, says Elon.
summary: Texas to the rescue? Tesla is exploring alternative ways to pay its CEO, Elon Musk, in a new deal that, if approved, would be the first time the EV maker’s pay proposal for the world’s richest man would be subject to Texas rather than Delaware law.
